SECTION_CONTENT:
Reactivity:
Reacts violently with strong acids.
Chemical Stability:
Material is stable under normal conditions.
Possibility of hazardous
reactions:
Hazardous polymerization does not occur. The substance is hygroscopic
and will absorb water by contact with the moisture in the air.
Conditions to avoid:
Avoid contact with oxidizing agents. Reacts violently with strong acids.
Heat. Moisture.
Incompatible Materials:
Moisture. Oxidizing agents. Acids. Maleic Anhydride Halogens.
Nitromethane. Contact with metals may evolve flammable hydrogen gas.
Hazardous Decomposition
Products:
Oxides of potassium.
